name: Jevon's Paradox
description: Efficiency increases result in usage increases.

name: Symbolic Paradox
description: Rich people pretend to be poor to fit in and poor people pretend to be rich to look cool.

name: Political Paradox
description: Any gain in coalition results in an accompanying loss in an incumbent faction of the coalition.

name: Puppet Paradox
description: Positions of authority more often than not have less authority than popularly realized.

name: Scapegoat Theory
description: When things get bad, the first person to be sacrificed is the prophet/founder.
